document_data.mainbody:
Ulena the Fox was a lillend proxy of the Faer没nian power known as Sel没ne and was that goddesss principal proxy.
Ulena was very conscientious when it came to her duty as a guardian of the Gates of the Moon, being suspicious of and questioning all who sought to enter Sel没nes divine realm.
Out of all planar visitors, Ulena particularly sought to keep out the more violent and glory-seeking inhabitants of Ysgard, on account of the fact that when killed her species and Sel没nes shards were not reborn in the same way that petitioners were.
Some rumors claimed that Ulena was in particularly vile moods whenever it was a new moon.
